headline: Best Buy (BBY): Reassessing Valuation After a Flat Three-Year Run and This Year’s Share Price Drop
summary: Recent Stock Performance and Why It Matters Now Best Buy (BBY) has been grinding through a choppy stretch, and that makes its recent performance worth a closer look. The stock is roughly flat over the past 3 years but down around 17% this year. See our latest analysis for Best Buy. That weak year to date share price return and negative one year total shareholder return suggest sentiment has cooled, even though steady earnings growth hints the risk reward balance could improve if execution...
